plans.title: Starter
plans.description: Perfect for startups and small businesses looking to implement their first AI solution.

plans.title: Growth
plans.description: Ideal for growing businesses ready to leverage AI for competitive advantage.

plans.title: Enterprise
plans.description: For organizations requiring comprehensive, custom AI solutions at scale.

faqs.question: How do you determine the exact price for my project?
faqs.answer: We assess several factors including project complexity, timeline, required AI services, integration needs, and ongoing support requirements. After an initial consultation, we provide a detailed quote tailored to your specific needs.

faqs.question: Do you offer discounts for startups or non-profits?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer special pricing for qualified startups and non-profit organizations. Please contact us to discuss your specific situation and learn about our startup and non-profit programs.

faqs.question: What's included in the implementation cost?
faqs.answer: Our implementation costs typically include requirements analysis, solution design, development, testing, deployment, documentation, and initial training. Ongoing support and maintenance are usually covered under separate agreements.

faqs.question: Do you offer ongoing maintenance and support?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer various support and maintenance packages to ensure your AI solutions continue to perform optimally. These can be customized based on your needs and can include regular updates, performance monitoring, and technical support.

faqs.question: Can I upgrade my plan as my business grows?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! Our pricing tiers are designed to scale with your business. You can start with a Starter plan and upgrade to Growth or Enterprise as your AI needs expand. We'll work with you to ensure a smooth transition.

faqs.question: Do you offer a money-back guarantee?
faqs.answer: We work with clearly defined milestones and deliverables. While we don't offer a traditional money-back guarantee, our contracts include specific performance criteria and acceptance testing to ensure you're satisfied with the delivered solution.
